title: Halo 3 - Sunrise
heading: May Playlist Update
body: Good to see you Spartan,|n|nTo help out with searching, Social Doubles and Social SWAT playlists have been added|nThe Living Dead playlist is now also available under the Social category to help mid-sized lobbies find games.|n|nWatch this space, more experimental playlists will be coming, like Social Tactical and Head to Head.|n|nIf you haven't already, be sure to grab the 1.0.2 patch from the Original Halo 3 Discord server at https://discord.gg/halo3.
